Name: cross board soccer
About the game: Two points together indicate direction of shooting. Player can create scoring opportunities from many directions simultaneously. Battlefields in TOP view >>>>>>>> Battlefields in Perspective view >> Battlefields in Picture view >>>>>> Gameplay >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> -cbs Board designs >>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Rules >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> -rules Cross Board Soccer full control soccer, player has full control of all of his points and their interactions player who as first puts one of his point on the net field belonging to the opponent player wins the game available moves are shown by clicking on each point in order to score a point has to jump over a neighboring point from the same team and, after moving in a straight line, land on the opponent player's net field any point can be used as a scoring point this way scoring opportunities can be created from many directions simultaneously game can be played in top view as well as in perspective view additional features: zoom, save game, load game, undo and three levels of difficulty: easy, medium and hard It also features three different board designs Challenge >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> ...
